title: Work From Home? Available Now: Two Bedroom With Den @Alexan NoHo West!
posting_body: Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1247 Sq.
Welcome to North Hollywood’s most stylish residence, conveniently located within NoHo West – a vibrant new retail and dining destination.
This unique address surrounds you with walkable shops, restaurants, services and green spaces, all just steps from your front door.

The designer rental homes feature fresh, modern interiors alongside a luxe “staycation” worthy amenity collection, highlighted by sun-splashed pools, well-appointed social spaces, serene indoor-outdoor retreats and plenty of spots to entertain and escape.
All accompanied by great shopping and dining right across the street.
It’s a whole new direction for NoHo – join the list and be one of the first to discover it.
